locations.name: Home
locations.description:
Player starts off in the living room standing, fully dressed for the workday. On your dresser are your: keys, money, bus card, and phone.
Its 7:30AM and you need to head to work now. Will you drive your car or take the bus?

locations.name: Bus
locations.description: You step onto the bus, and as you approach the driver, you notice a friendly smile on their face. The bus driver seems approachable and ready to assist you.

locations.name: Bus Driver Conversation

options.GOOD: Bus Driver knows where DRW is and is helpful
options.BAD: Bus Driver does not know where DRW is, is not helpful

locations.description: You approach the Bus Driver and ask:"I'm trying to go to the DRW Building. Do you happen to know what stop I need to get there?"

locations.name: Bus Stop One
locations.description: You are near the first stop, eyes immediately drawn to the pull cord running along the windows. That simple cord represents your exit strategy, your ticket to disembarking at what you hope will be the right stop for work. Your hand hovers near the cord, ready to pull when the moment feels right.

locations.name: Bus Stop 2
locations.description: You are near the second stop, eyes immediately drawn to the pull cord running along the windows. That simple cord represents your exit strategy, your ticket to disembarking at what you hope will be the right stop for work. Your hand hovers near the cord, ready to pull when the moment feels right.

locations.name: Bus Stop 3
locations.description: You are near the third stop, eyes immediately drawn to the pull cord running along the windows. That simple cord represents your exit strategy, your ticket to disembarking at what you hope will be the right stop for work. Your hand hovers near the cord, ready to pull when the moment feels right.

locations.name: Wrong Stop Delay
locations.description:
You get off the bus, but you don't know where you are. You certainly are nowhere near DRW. You got off on the wrong stop You wander for a bit until you see familiar buildings. 
DELAYED: 30 minutes.
HEAD DOWNTOWN

options.___comment___: THIS WILL ADD A DELAY, REGARDLESS OF WHAT OPTION YOU CHOOSE, BUT YOU STILL HEAD DOWNTOWN

locations.name: Downtown
locations.description: A bustling Chicago skyline with the Willis Tower, as you rush through busy streets on your first day, hoping to arrive on time

locations.name: Speak with Person
locations.description: Talk with person or ignore

options.GOOD: The Person is helpful, you can head straight to DRW building
options.BAD: The Person is not helpful, you are lost for X minutes, delaying your time to get to work

locations.description: At a cozy coffee shop, a latte sets a positive tone for your first day

locations.name: Coffee Event, a boost
locations.description: Coffee sipping, setting a positive tone for the day

options.GOOD: You get a caffeine high, you get to work earlier

locations.name: Coffee Event, no boost
locations.description: Coffee sipping, ok start

options.BAD: The coffee was nasty, you are delayed on your way to work
